description.rawText: joinA successful credit and risk mitigation software company,  simplifying complexity into thoughtful interfaces is looking for a data-driven experienced professional to join the company as a data scientist.   The data scientist will use information to craft the best fraud detection system,  and achieve better coverage and accuracy. ResponsibilitiesMentor the risk analysis team in research and feature engineering tasks. Model fraud detection inference and prediction. Build decision models to optimize performance and coverage. Cooperate with other teams to enhance processes and expedite model development life-cycles,  while allowing others to contribute to the process. Develop models and visualizations to help identify fraud ring attacks. Monitor classifier and model performance using visualizations. Job Requirements:3+ years of experience in the industry or a PhD in a quantitative field- a must. Solid understanding of statistics and applied mathematics. Experienced-based familiarity with data science best-practices. Able to write clean and concise code,  ideally in R or Python. Creative thinker who has proven ability to innovate through data exploration and application of non-trivial solutions. Dedication and persistence when it comes to monitoring and improving performance after deployment. Required Experience:3-4 שניםLocations:מרכז,  ירושלים,  השרוןSub Categories:אנליסט שיווק

companyDescription.rawText: We are the first placement agency in Israel specializing in digital marketing personnelWhat does it mean?That we know the internet landscape.  We are internet freaks,  optimization oriented,  social media masters,  ROI fanatics.  Our team eats,  sleeps and breathes Digital,  literally.  At Join,  we attend to the great challenges of this new field and understand all the nuances of these new professions that are being created by the internet. Beyond recruiting for all digital professions,  we put special attention to detail to find the right person for the job.  The one that not only brings the perfect skill set to the table,  but also perfectly fits the company’s very own DNA. join us @: jobs@join. co. il
